entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning then to snow mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
